content: 8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around page 4 of 6 © distracted design labs updated 8/1/2014 10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 13 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 6 single_crochet repeat from * around 42st 17 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 19 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 5 single_crochet repeat from * around 36st 20 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 21 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around 30st 22 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around 24st stuff body firmly and continue to stuff as more row are completed 23 *sc6 decrease x3 sc6 decrease x3 18st 24 *decrease sc3 decrease x3 sc3 decrease x2 12st 25 *decrease around repeat from * until closed fasten_off and weave in end ears and tail make 3 1 work 4 single_crochet into magic_ring 2 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 6 st 3 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2sc repeat from * around 8 st 4 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3sc repeat from * around 10 st fasten_off and end with a long tail stuff firmly horns make 2 1 with contrasting color work 4 single_crochet into magic_ring page 5 of 6 © distracted design labs updated 8/1/2014 2 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 6 st 3 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2sc repeat from * around 8 st fasten_off and end with a long tail stuff firmly assembly ensure ears are stuffed firmly and attach to outside top of head ensure horns are stuffed firmly and attach to top of head between ears attach arms to body with the top of the arms at approximately row 13 of body weave in all loose yarn ends face embroider mouth with a chain stitch across front using black yarn cut 1 white felt circles for eyes and ½ black felt circles for pupils stitch pupils onto eyes with black thread and then stitch eyes in place on the monster s face with white thread complete mouth by stitching on two small white felt triangles for teeth page 6 of 6 © distracted design labs
